0: Our service was good but again other people in our party had experiences that were not as good extraordinarily long waits for room service and items requested from front desk requests for service to a slow draining sink not addressed etc
Two were out of commission and we were told that were being repaired however we still waited over 25 minutes going to three different elevator banks to get to our room
Room was nice but bulbs were burnt out at the main TV console
Clean room Negatives Smelled like marijuana on just about every hallway I walked down especially the floor where the pool is

We were on the 5th floor in a room which had definitely seen it is share of parties broken lamp the sliding door to bathroom kept getting stuck because it was off the track making it unable to open once occupied so we just had to leave it open awkward
The rooms here are modern in style but getting tired and in need of a make over
I am glad I got a room for free using my points because I would have been even more upset if I had to pay out of pocket
I feel that for the price of the room the accommodations and quality was not up to par
It was very apparent that there have been a lot of people that stayed in my room
Woke up next morning bathroom flooded leak from the sink
1: In the mornings the room service breakfast was on time and delicious
Rooms are set up like a convenience stores
2: Great location close to Piedmont Parka great place to go check out easy public transportation access a variety of good options close by but their menu is good as well very comfortable rooms inviting lobby area with plenty of seating room with a local DJ spinning record on some afternoons overall very nice place
Good view clean rooms and comfortable bed
Rooms were well appointed and clean
The bed was super comfortable and the temp of the room was easily adjustable
And do not forget the funky cupboard under the stairs complete with orange velvet fringed sofa and appropriate for hip little wizards looking for a quiet place to have a quick meeting
Excellent renovation of the outside patio
The food was always hot AND ALWAYS tasted great room service TRACE and The Lobby Bar
I liked that the TV and bed were not in front of each other but rather to the side
I gave the gentleman at the front desk 200 and he explained that the money would be refunded to me less room charges via check approximately 48 hours after check out
I had no food but I was interested in returning as I viewed the plate presentations and selections looked very appealing
